named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getUserLoggedIn
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj),function('DATE',obj.authTime) as dateAuth FROM XXAuthSession obj GROUP BY dateAuth

named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getAuthSessionBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuthSession obj WHERE obj.extSessionId = :sessionId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByEmailAddress
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.emailAddress = :emailAddress

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByLoginId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.loginId = :loginId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByPublicScreenName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.publicScreenName = :publicScreenName

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByRole
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj, XXPortalUserRole role WHERE obj.id = role.userId and role.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.getUserAddedReport
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj), function('DATE',obj.createTime) as createDate FROM XXPortalUser obj GROUP BY createDate

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByRoleUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId and obj.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByParentId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :parentId

named-query.name: XXAsset.findByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAsset obj WHERE obj.name = :name AND obj.activeStatus != :status

named-query.name: XXAuditMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuditMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroup obj, XXGroupUser groupUser WHERE obj.id = groupUser.parentGroupId and groupUser.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPermMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPermMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xxAsset WHERE xxAsset.id = obj.assetId and xxAsset.assetType = :assetType

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndRecursiveFlag
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.isRecursive=:isRecursive

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndResourceType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.resourceType=:resourceType

named-query.name: XXResource.getMaxUpdateTimeForAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(obj.updateTime) FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetIdAndResourceStatus
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId and obj.resourceStatus = :resourceStatus

named-query.name: XXUser.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXUser obj WHERE LOWER(obj.name)=:name

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByGroupName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXGroup obj WHERE LOWER(obj.name)=:name

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.deleteByGroupIdAndUserId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.parentGroupId=:parentGroupId AND obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.findByTrxId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXTrxLog obj WHERE obj.transactionId = :transactionId
